bike.description: S-Works E5, fully manipulated SLX tubing, semi-compact Freeroad design, shaped top and down tube

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon Tricross fork, carbon legs, aluminum steerer w/ Speed Zertz
Specialized Mindset Plus Carbon, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
S-Works SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
